Description: You dive at a creature with such speed that it is impossible for them to avoid. This move is guaranteed to hit for flying damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
